SILKEN_SISTERS_INFOPROMPT:
Some conditions are not met to enter the memory fight.<page>You need to:
Defeat Lace2
Defeat Phantom
Be in act3
Have Elegy of the Deep<page>If you are using mods to replay bosses, you might have incorrect PlayerData.

Exit and reenter Organ afterward.
